channel.title: Phone Cell India Phones on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Phone Cell India Phones on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: rupies
item.description: i just added 1000 rupies to my cell phone. haha. rule. pre paid cell phones rule so much. I may never go back. haha. all my calls will be international roaming from india. haha. you might be able to send me an sms message if you go here. all hours of the night I hope to receive messages from yall. haha. I rule.
